General.Name: Israel Corp
General.Description: Israel Corporation Ltd, through its investee companies, operates in the specialty minerals and chemical businesses in Asia, Europe, South America, North America, and internationally. It offers bromine and bromine-based compounds; magnesia, calcium carbonate, salt, and phosphorous-based products; potash; phosphate-based products; and controlled release fertilizers, water soluble fertilizers, liquid fertilizers and straights, soil and foliar micronutrients, secondary nutrients, bio-stimulants, soil conditioners, seed treatment products, and adjuvants. The company was founded in 1968 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.
